post.body: oh yeah. I hear ya!
ahh, we are going there for xmas eve! should be fun with a table full of loved ones!
You are so right. But when does the govt do the smart thing v. the political thing? sigh...
How is Copenhagan? Long flight, I bet. R u on FB also? didn't mean to be rude. twitter is so short..
great video. So true. Life is a party! Thanks for sharing.
good. that makes sense. who are you? A a name would help:-) And what do you do?
Hi. you were in my gmail, how do we know each other? ed therapy? coaching?
I didn't know you were in SD. I'm so out of it! Did you have fun? Sorry to have missed you!
yes, our little girl is so precious! thanks! I'm still getting the hang of twitter, sorry for the 2 months late reply!
I haven't done Yoga in a while and miss it! But I have been doing my bootcamp workouts and am seeing results. Bliss out!
so gr8tful 4 wonderful family & friends! gr8t party 2day 4 lulu's baptism. goodnite all!
gr8t walk in sun & clouds! got starbucks, saw a rainbow (!), talked w/ dear friend; rain poured @ very end of walk.
today got sent pics of our baby when she was 5 mo old in a body cast. so glad she was rescued & given to us! Now she is 3 & healthy!ptl
ok well that was easy and it worked, no problem!
trying mobile update
Is going to take a nap!!
Here is your free book http://abbrr.com/z61
Sweet dreams, all!
Dinner: fresh grilled salmon, portabello w/ grilled onions, steamed broccoli & yam fries with my secret spice combo!!! yummy
Time to go to bed, since all this computer time & lack of movement is adling my poor ol' noggin!
